title: Add Facebook profile link to site footer

requirements.text: Add a new Facebook social link in the website footer that points to https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61575271824165.

quotes: Replace an existing social link with this one
add a new Facebook link to the footer\

acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays a Facebook link/icon under a "Follow Us" (or equivalent) label.
The Facebook link opens in a new tab and includes rel="noopener noreferrer".
The Facebook link is present anywhere the footer renders (including the main site and payment status pages).
The Facebook link has accessible labeling (e.g., aria-label="Facebook").

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all backend logic within the existing single Motoko actor; no new backend canisters/services.
nonGoals: Adding or changing any other social media links (Instagram/Twitter/etc.).
Adding or displaying the provided GST Registration Number (05AOOPP7917D2ZO) anywhere in the UI unless explicitly requested later.
Any changes to backend data models, persistence, or APIs.
